name: The Despicable Angry Little Candy Thief Flappy Mania Rush - Free Kids Game
name_original: The Despicable Angry Little Candy Thief Flappy Mania Rush - Free Kids Game
description:
The Baldies and the Blondie have finally snagged their biggest prize yet: delicious candy from the Candy Kingdom! However, the Candy Kingdom enforcers are right on their heels in this epic rundown. Help the Baldies and Blondie escape with their delicious treats!

THE RUNDOWN:
-Dodge the enforcers and other angry monsters in your escape!
-Watch out for obstacles that block your path
-Collect more delicious candy while dusting the enforcers

Remember to beat your friends' high scores using Game Center capabilities! Have fun and good luck!
